segments.text: I notice the bright light coming from the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so tidy and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman is methodically drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's concentrated, towel bunched around the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the water is pouring over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even glanced down at her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy is up on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly reaching for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look like they're having a little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool does seem a bit unsteady though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, it's cute how they're sharing the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic chaos has a charming side to it.
segments.speaker: PAR
